title.rendered: North Star Air in Thunder Bay, Ontario, Canada

content.rendered:
North Star Air is a Canadian charter and cargo airline headquartered in Thunder Bay, Ontario, with secondary passenger hub in Sioux Lookout, Ontario, and cargo hubs located in Pickle Lake, and Red Lake. Founded in 1997.

 

 

North Star Air in Ontario, Canada Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: 1480 Walsh Street, West
Thunder Bay, ON P7E 6H6

Phone:
Toll-Free: 1-844-633-6294

Fax: 807-475-8040

Email: admin@northstarair.ca

Reservations
Email: reservations@northstarair.ca
Phone: 1-844-633-6294

Charter Sales
Email: charters@northstarair.ca

Cargo
Email: cargo@northstarair.ca

North Star Air Official website: http://www.northstarair.ca/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with North Star Air

Total fleet: 14

  • ATR 72
  • Douglas DC-3
  • Pilatus PC-12

North Star Air Baggage Allowance

View North Star Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in North Star Air

Traveling with Pets in North Star Air

  • North Star Air will accept pets for travel provided the kennel is approved by the airline.

For more details: http://www.northstarair.ca/baggage-information

Queries handled by North Star Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the North Star Air in Ontario, Canada Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the North Star Air in Ontario, Canada: (click on the stars below)
